title: A Soothing Experience!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hey, Lanzhu-chan, you ate Nico-chan’s handmade cooking, right? I heard from her~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah. When Lanzhu said Lanzhu wanted to eat some Peking duck, she made me some chicken karaage. It was really delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu. Nico-chan’s cooking was really soothing, wasn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Soothing....? Lanzhu is not sure how that would feel like. Lanzhu was just so excited back then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s like a calm and relaxing feeling.... Hmm.... That’s right! Would you go out with me after this? We’re going to go drink something sweet, creamy, and warm! You might understand it after we drink that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Is that so? Then Lanzhu wants to go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s a store near the shrine where Nozomi-chan helps out, so maybe we can meet her too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! Going out with a friend and meeting another, it’s the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, then, let’s get going!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu can’t wait to feel the soothing feeling with you and Nozomi~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
